Trade/Device Name(s): BioTeke Sterile Disposable Virus Sampling Kit
BioTeke Sterile Disposable Virus Sampling Swab Kit
Specimen Container(s): 10 mL polymer tube containing 3 mL Virus Transport Media (VTM)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BioTeke Sterile Disposable Virus Sampling Kit for collection and transport of respiratory specimens using a swab and culture-based transport media.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for collection and transport of clinical specimens to the laboratory for standard diagnostic/identification techniques including respiratory viral diagnostic assays such as Influenza, RSV A/B, Parainfluenza, Adenovirus, and Rhinovirus.
